crib1.description: Now that he can go effortlessly from lying to sitting, Milo is moving on to bigger challenges.
crib1.title: Crib 1

crib3.description:
And he's standing!

Yes, we lowered the mattress on the crib after this.
crib3.title: Crib 3

crib5.description: Milo actually uses his mouth to help pull himself up to standing.
crib5.title: Crib 5

dressup1.description: Felix hadn't been particularly interested in playing dress-up, but this week he got game.  It started one day after bathtime:  all wrapped in towels, he proclaimed himself a princess.
dressup1.title: Dressup 1

dressup2.description: Lucie donned the knight costume sent by Babushka and attempted to rescue the princess from the dragon. The princess said he could defend himself, and borrowed a glove from the knight.
dressup2.title: Dressup 2

dressup3.description: Then, well, the princess shed her towels and became a knight. The dragon mercilessly attacked the new princess.
dressup3.title: Dressup 3

dressup4.description: Next day, more dress-up. We got fancy and made paper crowns.
dressup4.title: Dressup 4

dressup6.description: Princess Felix gives her dress a twirl. The dress was originally Lucie's Halloween costume in year 2000 (as Lucy In The Sky With Diamonds).   It's been hemmed up for Felix, because princesses shouldn't trip on their dresses.
dressup6.title: Dressup 6

nora1.description: A Mardi Gras-themed supper at Sarah and Dell's. Teresa is cooking dirty rice.
nora1.title: Nora 1

nora2.description: On the left is Nora.  Can you guess who the devastatingly handsome masked gentleman is?
nora2.title: Nora 2

nora3.description: Felix insisted on wearing his princess outfit for the evening.
nora3.title: Nora 3

nora4.description: Not wanting to be upstaged, Nora became a hula girl and danced for us.
nora4.title: Nora 4

nora5.description:
Sarah and Dell have a dog named Otto. Otto was pretty rowdy but Felix liked playing with him anyway.

(Felix had to remove his dress to eat ice cream)
nora5.title: Nora 5

portland1.description: Dean went to Portland to visit friends, but forgot to take any pictures of the friends.
portland1.title: Portland 1

portland2.description: ... and he took a side trip to the Columbia river gorge.
portland2.title: Portland 2

portland3.description: ... where he did some hiking at Multnomah Falls.
portland3.title: Portland 3

sippy.description: Milo continues to explore the world of non-Lucie nutrition.  He eats anywhere from a half to a full jar of baby food every day, in several small servings. He likes the fruit ones the best.  And he's drinking from a sippy cup, just a little. He likes water better than formula.
sippy.title: Sippy

spring.description: It's been T-shirt weather for the last few days.
spring.title: Spring

description:
Felix suddenly LOVES playing dress up. He spent all Saturday dressed as a princess and Sunday a cosmonaut.

At Milo's six month check-up, he was 16 lbs 4 ounces (7.3 kg) and 27.5 inches (70 cm). New tricks this week:

  • Pulling himself to standing
  • Banging stuff. (Like knock-knock-knocking a toy on the floor.)
  • Crying when Lucie leaves the room

Dean went to Portland, Oregon for the weekend to visit friends. He's trying to cram in as much fun stuff before his new job starts on Valentine's day (Feb 14).
title: January 31
